Blog - page 72

  1. 100/365

    18.04.2011

    The hundredth day, what better time to start using my new extension tubes? I had a number of issues with my original, 7-quid-from-Amazon tubes, so on pay day I bought myself the more expensive Kenko set.

    So far, so good, I guess. It's really difficult though. Next purchase: either a shutter remote control or a tripod that doesn't shake like mad when the shutter is pressed.

  2. 99/365: Steph

    17.04.2011

    My beautiful wife. Normally she doesn't like having her photo taken (she'll have no choice when I've run out of ideas for my 365) but she was okay with this one.

  3. 98/365
